pages.text: $(bgreen)Squash$() is actually its stage name. Its birth name was Tracy.$(br)$(byellow)Sun Cost$() : $(l)50$()$(br)$(bblue)Recharge$() : $(l)Little Slow$()$(br)$(l)Features$() : It is a $(l)close attack$() plant, which will smash zombies that gets close to it. Each smash will have $(bred)a large chance to die$().
$(bgreen)Plant Food :$() It will gain $(l)serveral extra smash chances$().
